name: web-check
description: web-check is a self-hosted tool that inspects and reports on website health, security, performance, and DNS configuration via a detailed, interactive web dashboard.
features: Security analysis: Scan websites for security headers, SSL/TLS configuration, and common vulnerabilities.
Performance metrics: Measure page load times, resource sizes, and identify performance bottlenecks.
DNS inspection: View complete DNS records including A, AAAA, MX, TXT, and CNAME entries for domains.
SSL certificate details: Examine certificate validity, issuer information, and expiration dates.
Server information: Identify web server software, hosting provider, and technology stack used.
Redirect chains: Trace HTTP redirects to understand URL routing and identify redirect loops.
Port scanning: Check which ports are open on the target server for security assessment.
WHOIS lookup: Retrieve domain registration information including registrar and expiration dates.
Lighthouse integration: Run Google Lighthouse audits for accessibility, SEO, and best practices scoring.
Social media tags: Verify Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata for proper social sharing.
Mobile compatibility: Test responsive design and mobile-friendliness of websites.
Export reports: Generate comprehensive PDF or JSON reports for documentation or client presentations.
